tesla_na1970172089182421209.content: If you have driving anxiety, FSD Supervised can help you get back on the road
tesla_na1970172089182421209.author: tesla_na

tesla_na1953502095400673463.content: Anti-theft tech comes standard with every Tesla  – Sentry Mode (uses your car's cameras to detect, record & alert you to potential threats – you can also view a live video feed via the Tesla app)  – PIN to drive  – Always-on real-time location tracking  Teslas are easy to use,
tesla_na1953502095400673463.author: tesla_na

tesla_na1952105805991362974.content: You can send any address to your Tesla & it will plan the route including charging stops, if needed  It will then drive itself (under your supervision) all the way to your destination
tesla_na1952105805991362974.author: tesla_na

tesla_na1919328664044413433.content: We make the most American-made cars  That drive themselves from the end of the production line to the outbound logistics lot  And then continue to drive themselves anywhere you want under your supervision
tesla_na1919328664044413433.author: tesla_na

tesla_na1913712041329590606.content: Imagine not having to breathe in fumes in a parking garage because all cars are electric
tesla_na1913712041329590606.author: tesla_na

tesla_na1906719881195622874.content: Designed, engineered & made in the US
tesla_na1906719881195622874.author: tesla_na
